snippet: A prominent Tibetan writer living in Beijing said on Thursday that police had placed her under house arrest to prevent her from receiving a prize from the Dutch Embassy.
abstract: Woeser, a prominent Tibetan writer living in Beijing says that police have placed her under house arrest to prevent her from receiving a prize from the Dutch Embassy.
lead_paragraph: A prominent Tibetan writer living in Beijing said on Thursday that police had placed her under house arrest to prevent her from receiving a prize from the Dutch Embassy.

headline.seo: Tibetan Writer Says China Is Blocking Her From Award
headline.main: Tibetan Writer Says China Is Blocking Her From Award
headline.print_headline: China: Tibetan Writer Barred From Award Ceremony
